No Poverty.reason: Course focuses on international sales law; no direct coverage of poverty alleviation or social safety nets.

Zero Hunger.reason: No content related to food security or hunger issues.

Good Health and Well-being.reason: No health-related topics addressed; only indirectly could support well-being through professional skill development.

Quality Education.reason: Course contributes to higher education by developing knowledge and skills in international trade law and dispute resolution.

Gender Equality.reason: No specific focus on gender equality or empowerment.

Clean Water and Sanitation.reason: No relevance; environmental sanitation issues are not covered.

Affordable and Clean Energy.reason: No content related to energy production or sustainability.

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: Highly relevant as understanding international sales law supports trade, business operations, and economic growth.

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: Moderately relevant; course indirectly supports international trade infrastructure through legal knowledge.

Reduced Inequalities.reason: Limited relevance; could indirectly reduce inequalities through knowledge of fair trade laws, but not explicitly addressed.

Sustainable Cities and Communities.reason: No content on urban sustainability or community development.

Responsible Consumption and Production.reason: No direct discussion on sustainable consumption or production practices.

Climate Action.reason: No relevance to climate change or environmental policy.

Life Below Water.reason: No coverage of marine ecosystems or biodiversity.

Life on Land.reason: No content on terrestrial ecosystems or biodiversity.

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: Core relevance as course develops understanding of legal frameworks, dispute resolution, and rule of law in international trade.

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: Limited relevance; course involves international trade context but does not explicitly cover partnerships for SDGs.
